articles.description: Jenni Hermoso is not included in Spain's first squad since winning the Women's World Cup, but 15 members of that triumphant team are named.
articles.title: Spain call up 15 World Cup winners but Hermoso left out

articles.description: Callum Hudson-Odoi scores a glorious equaliser on his Nottingham Forest debut to salvage a Premier League draw against Burnley.

articles.description: Diane Caldwell says the Republic of Ireland qualified for their first World Cup "in spite" of then manager Vera Pauw.
articles.title: Republic World Cup qualification 'in spite' of Pauw

articles.description: The Denver Broncos pull off a "Hail Mary" play alongside the rest of the NFL plays of the week from the second round of games.
